name: Doomsday School
description:
This is an RPG survival game
background:
A deadly zombie virus suddenly spreads across the school
Many teachers and students have turned into zombies
And you
Will be the survivor of this school
you must
Kill zombies
Looking for more survival supplies
stay alive
Learn more ways to survive
And try to help more students

Currently playable characters
Currently there are two roles: a teacher and a student

Some just want to survive
